\begin{tcAthena}
declare prec: [Day Day] -> Boolean

assert* prec-def := [(d1 prec d2 <==>
                     d1 =/= Sunday & (d2 = next d1 | (next d1) prec d2))]
\end{tcAthena}
Note that the first conjunct, \smtt{(d1 =/= Sunday)}, is crucial.
